title: My champion stereotypes, part 2.

replies.body:
> {{champion:202}}  "We get it."

Only 3 words?
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/001/185/750/a53.jpg
quick, we must reach 44

It's so close.  Just one more...

If someone ever does make this reach 44.  Please leave a reply so I notice, I want the satisfaction.

>{{champion:222}}  "I swear i would hate you if only there wasn't so much porn."

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Name checks out.
Naut is spot on. I'll swim until i see an adc then it's anchor time.

I'll allow this since the Morgana one does not reflect a negative towards her directly.

And the Nautilus is spot on.

>{{champion:98}} "Ults when you dont need him to, "It was on CD!" on every important fight."

Because you motherf*ckers use all your mobility to run from a fight when I just gave you a free incoming win. I mean, COME ON!!!

i feel somewhat the same as sion, when i ult for a teamfight from a mile away, they wait until i hit my target until moving closer to them, instead of coming when they see me, geez, people just dont understand tank engages

> [{quoted}](name=Zack Crimson,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NXwoLuFI,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-09-09T05:04:38.041+0000)
>
> {{champion:35}} &quot;/mute all, proceeds to make the game a living nightmare for **both** of the teams&quot;

ftfy
Don't forget Singed players are usually toxic asf or the absolute best people you'll ever meet in this game.

The only thing I've ever seen a {{champion:54}}  say is
R- Ready.
I feel like that's the only thing he should say.
The only rude Sonas I've seen use classic or DJ, no in-between.
classic are those who got autofilled support and are resentful D.J. are wallet warriors who are toxic in every game.

{{champion:27}} "200 IQ players with Initial D on their veins. Will NOT go possitive."

"Will NOT go possitive."

That's why you just gotta kill your enemy laner instead of proxyfarming. Think about it, they can't farm when they're dead.


{{champion:89}} "I WILL MASSACRE YOU. I. WILL. FUCK. YOU. UP. (I never thought a champ like Leona could have such a toxic player base.)"

It's not that i'm toxic,They just need to accept the suns glory {{item:3748}} {{item:3078}} .


{{champion:222}} "I swear i would hate you if only there wasn't so much porn."

... not my fault Fishbones looks so damn sexy.
Ive never seen a toxic Nami or Sona, and I have Mastery on both
{{champion:120}} should be "PantsAreDragon fanboys"

{{champion:82}} needs at least a few more HUE's

{{champion:72}} thats before he gets his full build, in which case he just e+aa+q+aa+aa and you just die
as a maokai main, this is accurate

{{champion:6}}: "Will ult literally only to steal your kill. Proceeds to solo kill the fed opponent with the gold."

Only know because I've done it so many times I can still hear my teammates raging at me.
Was.. that {{champion:78}} one a Skooch reference?..

{{champion:27}} true, true. I don't even try to go positive with this guy.

{{champion:2}} I don't play him, but you are exactly right.

{{champion:126}} only guy I hate more than Draaaaven!!
How do you know about Jayce? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Sion and skarner have caused my sides to reach orbit
Can confirm, {{champion:21}}  is the only adc i "know" how to play.
Gotta admit though, you're right. {{champion:203}} and {{champion:127}} are both awesome, unique, and stylish champs with some crazy awesome lores. They need some more devoted fans.

> [{quoted}](name=Zack Crimson,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NXwoLuFI,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-09-09T05:04:38.041+0000)
>

> {{champion:89}}"I WILL MASSACRE YOU. I. WILL. FUCK. YOU. UP. (I never thought a champ like Leona could have such a toxic player base.)"

I am a Leona main. This is too accurate.
The {{champion:21}} is pretty accurate.
Why did you use quotation marks if you didn't quote anybody :^)
I'm quoting my mind, i don't wanna get sued because of thinking.
That Shyvana one was on point. Every time I see her that's what happens. And as a Karthus player, while I do button mash my Q, I don't need a script to know when to ult :P
As a Kled player, that is totally accurate.
